assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have no conflict of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Given the retrospective nature of the study, French law did not require ethics committee approval.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All patients were informed in writing of the study and the ensuing manuscript, and contacted directly by the first author. Those for whom results are reported therefore explicitly agreed to participate.
